0.text: Innate: Lux's damaging abilities mark enemies with light energy for 6 seconds.

1.text: Lux's basic attacks and  Final Spark consume the mark to deal 20 − 190 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.

0.text: Active: Lux releases a sphere of light in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit and  roots them for 2 seconds.
Active: Lux launches her wand in the target direction which returns to her after reaching maximum range.

1.text: The wand grants a  shield to all allied  champions it passes through for 2.5 seconds while it is outgoing and returning. Lux also receives the shield upon releasing the wand and upon its return. The shield can stack up to 2 times, stacking with the previous shield and refreshing its duration.

0.text: Active: Lux sends an anomaly of twisted light to the target location for up to 5 seconds, granting  sight of the area and  slowing enemies within. Lucent Singularity can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.

1.text: Recast: Lux detonates the anomaly, dealing magic damage to all enemies within. If Lucent Singularity was recast while in flight, it will detonate upon arrival.

2.text: The slow lingers for 1 second after leaving the area. Enemies hit by Lucent Singularity's detonation are also slowed by the same amount for 1 second.

0.text: Active: Lux fires a massive laser of light in a line in the target direction that deals magic damage to all enemies hit and briefly  reveals them as well as grants  sight of the surrounding area.

1.concerningText: Active: Lux releases a sphere of light in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit and  roots them for 2 seconds.

2.concerningText: The wand grants a  shield to all allied  champions it passes through for 2.5 seconds while it is outgoing and returning. Lux also receives the shield upon releasing the wand and upon its return. The shield can stack up to 2 times, stacking with the previous shield and refreshing its duration.

3.concerningText: Active: Lux sends an anomaly of twisted light to the target location for up to 5 seconds, granting  sight of the area and  slowing enemies within. Lucent Singularity can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.
Recast: Lux detonates the anomaly, dealing magic damage to all enemies within. If Lucent Singularity was recast while in flight, it will detonate upon arrival.

4.concerningText: Active: Lux fires a massive laser of light in a line in the target direction that deals magic damage to all enemies hit and briefly  reveals them as well as grants  sight of the surrounding area.

0.concerningText: Active: Lux releases a sphere of light in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit and  roots them for 2 seconds.

The wand grants a  shield to all allied  champions it passes through for 2.5 seconds while it is outgoing and returning. Lux also receives the shield upon releasing the wand and upon its return. The shield can stack up to 2 times, stacking with the previous shield and refreshing its duration.

Active: Lux sends an anomaly of twisted light to the target location for up to 5 seconds, granting  sight of the area and  slowing enemies within. Lucent Singularity can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.

1.concerningText: Recast: Lux detonates the anomaly, dealing magic damage to all enemies within. If Lucent Singularity was recast while in flight, it will detonate upon arrival.

0.concerningText: Active: Lux fires a massive laser of light in a line in the target direction that deals magic damage to all enemies hit and briefly  reveals them as well as grants  sight of the surrounding area.

Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and launches bolts at up to 3 enemies near them, dealing them the same damage, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and launches bolts at up to 3 enemies near them, dealing them the same damage, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
